## Analyse univarié

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
for(i in names(data)) {
  if(is.character(data[[i]])) {
      
      cat("\n### Analyse de la variable : ", i, "\n\n")
      
      # Tableau
      tab_eff <- tableau_d_effectif(data[[i]], i)
      print(knitr::kable(tab_eff))
      
       # Graphiques
      print(graph_en_bar(data[[i]], i))
      print(graph_camembert(data[[i]], i))
      
      cat("\n\n***\n\n")
    
  }
}
